## Notes / Footnotes
- Hazard ratios derived from Cox proportional hazards model.
- Hazard ratio <1 favors Active treatment.
- Model adjusted for prespecified baseline covariates.

## Analyses
Sensitivity and exploratory analyses supporting the primary Cox model.
